Html:
I downloaded Wabbitemu today and it worked great for a while. Then, I think I closed it and now I can't get it to re-open. When I click on the application, the window shoots off in a direction that I can't see. I see it flash to the right side of my screen and then I can't see it.

I don't know how to uninstall it. And I've tried re-downloading the .exe files, and it doesn't help.

And I'm not very tech-savvy, so any simple explanations would really help.
